item.title: EP 209 - Is PMS Real?
item.itunes:title: Is PMS Real?
item.description:
Today we examine whether Steve Urkel is really a trickster god sent to torment the Winslow family. And then we explore the theory that PMS is a psychosomatic illness!

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

Urkel

http://boards.4channel.org/x/thread/22593165

 

Steve Urkel

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Steve_Urkel

 

Is PMS A Myth? This Researcher Says Yes, And That It’s Holding Women Back

https://www.cityline.tv/2017/08/29/pms-myth-researcher-says-yes-holding-women-back/

 

IS PMS REAL OR A MYTH? MOODINESS AROUND PERIODS IS AN EXCUSE, PSYCHOLOGIST ARGUES

https://www.newsweek.com/pms-real-or-myth-moodiness-around-periods-excuse-psychologist-argues-713889

 

Of course PMS is "real." The real question is why we don't have a cure.

https://www.vox.com/science-and-health/2016/11/29/13765740/is-pms-real-slate-research-cure

 

Is PMS Real?

https://slate.com/technology/2016/11/pms-might-be-a-cultural-syndrome-not-a-biologic-one.html

 

BRITISH LEGAL DEBATE: PREMENSTRUAL TENSION AND CRIMINAL BEHAVIOR

https://www.nytimes.com/1981/12/29/science/british-legal-debate-premenstrual-tension-and-criminal-behavior.html

 

Should You Get Paid Time Off for PMS?

https://www.womenshealthmag.com/health/a19904623/paid-time-off-for-pms/

 

Premenstrual Dysphoric Disorder Clinical Presentation

https://emedicine.medscape.com/article/293257-clinical

 

Premenstrual syndrome (PMS)

https://www.mayoclinic.org/diseases-conditions/premenstrual-syndrome/symptoms-causes/syc-20376780

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

 

------------------------------------------------

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
